extension.description: zap2xml is an epg grabber which creates an xmltv file from data scraped from Zap2it (Screener) or TVguide listings. Create your account on either site, including setting up favorites for the channels you want to download. Then configure the zap2xml grabber in the tvheadend web interface. Consider adjusting your tvheadend cron settings so all users don't pull data at the same time.
